Module com.example.form
Package org.uwo.cs2212

Class Weather

java.lang.Object
org.uwo.cs2212.Weather
public class Weather extends Object
A class that retrieves weather information from the OpenWeatherMap API.

  • Constructor Details

    • Weather

      public Weather(double latitude, double longitude) throws IOException
      Constructs a new Weather object with the specified latitude and longitude.
      Parameters:
      latitude - the latitude of the location for which to retrieve weather information
      longitude - the longitude of the location for which to retrieve weather information
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error retrieving the weather data

  • Method Details

    • getWeather

      public String getWeather()
      Retrieves the current weather description for the location specified in the constructor.
      Returns:
      a String representing the current weather description, or "---" if there was an error retrieving the data

    • getTemp

      public Double getTemp()
      Retrieves the current temperature for the location specified in the constructor.
      Returns:
      a Double representing the current temperature in Celsius, or Double.NaN if there was an error retrieving the data

    • retrieveData

      public org.json.JSONObject retrieveData()
      Retrieves the JSON data for the weather information from the OpenWeatherMap API.
      Returns:
      a JSONObject representing the weather data

    • fetchWeather

      public HttpURLConnection fetchWeather() throws IOException
      Retrieves an HttpURLConnection for the weather information from the OpenWeatherMap API.
      Returns:
      an HttpURLConnection object that can be used to retrieve the weather data
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error connecting to the API

    • grabImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView grabImage(String icon) throws IOException
      Retrieves an ImageView for the specified weather icon.
      Parameters:
      icon - a String representing the weather icon code
      Returns:
      an ImageView object for the specified icon
      Throws:
      IOException - if there was an error retrieving the icon image

    • getIcon

      public String getIcon()
      Retrieves the current weather icon code for the location specified in the constructor.
      Returns:
      a String representing the current weather icon code
